languages.text: {n}Октавиана, сидящая подле царственного незнакомца, негромко, но властно произносит:{/n} "Кресла заняты. Обсудим Торг". {n}Слова ее звучат веско, словно ритуальная литания.{/n}

{n}Octaviana, who is seated next to the regal-looking stranger, quietly but in a commanding voice, declares:{/n} "The seats have been claimed. Now we discuss the Trade." {n}Her words sound weight, the opening of a ritual litany.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜坐在这位充满威严的陌生人旁边，以命令的口吻低声宣布道。{/n}“所有人都已到场，是时候讨论生意上的问题了。”{n}她的话听起来很正式，仿佛会议的开场白一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana, who is seated next to the regal-looking stranger, quietly but in a commanding voice, declares:{/n} "The seats have been claimed. Now we discuss the Trade." {n}Her words sound weight, the opening of a ritual litany.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜坐在这位充满威严的陌生人旁边，以命令的口吻低声宣布道。{/n}“所有人都已到场，是时候讨论生意上的问题了。”{n}她的话听起来很正式，仿佛会议的开场白一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}堂々とした風貌の見知らぬ男の隣に座ったオクタヴィアナが、静かに、しかし威厳のある声で宣言する。{/n}「席は確保した。さあ、交易について話し合いましょう」{n}彼女の言葉には、儀式の冒頭を飾るような響きと重みが伴っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana, who is seated next to the regal-looking stranger, quietly but in a commanding voice, declares:{/n} "The seats have been claimed. Now we discuss the Trade." {n}Her words sound weight, the opening of a ritual litany.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}堂々とした風貌の見知らぬ男の隣に座ったオクタヴィアナが、静かに、しかし威厳のある声で宣言する。{/n}「席は確保した。さあ、交易について話し合いましょう」{n}彼女の言葉には、儀式の冒頭を飾るような響きと重みが伴っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, sentada junto al desconocido de aspecto regio, declara con voz queda pero imperiosa:{/n} «Los asientos están ocupados. Ahora hablaremos del Comercio». {n}Sus palabras tienen el tono solemne del comienzo de una letanía ritual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana, who is seated next to the regal-looking stranger, quietly but in a commanding voice, declares:{/n} "The seats have been claimed. Now we discuss the Trade." {n}Her words sound weight, the opening of a ritual litany.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana, sentada junto al desconocido de aspecto regio, declara con voz queda pero imperiosa:{/n} «Los asientos están ocupados. Ahora hablaremos del Comercio». {n}Sus palabras tienen el tono solemne del comienzo de una letanía ritual.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Assise à côté de cet inconnu à l'allure royale, Octaviana déclare d'une voix à la fois douce et autoritaire :{/n} « Tout le monde est installé. Maintenant, parlons du Commerce. » {n}Ses paroles sont lourdes, comme le début d'une prière rituelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana, who is seated next to the regal-looking stranger, quietly but in a commanding voice, declares:{/n} "The seats have been claimed. Now we discuss the Trade." {n}Her words sound weight, the opening of a ritual litany.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Assise à côté de cet inconnu à l'allure royale, Octaviana déclare d'une voix à la fois douce et autoritaire :{/n} « Tout le monde est installé. Maintenant, parlons du Commerce. » {n}Ses paroles sont lourdes, comme le début d'une prière rituelle.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, die neben dem königlich anmutenden Fremden sitzt, erklärt leise, aber mit befehlender Stimme:{/n} "Die Plätze wurden eingenommen. Jetzt sprechen wir übers Geschäft." {n}Ihre Worte haben Gewicht, wie der Beginn einer rituellen Litanei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana, who is seated next to the regal-looking stranger, quietly but in a commanding voice, declares:{/n} "The seats have been claimed. Now we discuss the Trade." {n}Her words sound weight, the opening of a ritual litany.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana, die neben dem königlich anmutenden Fremden sitzt, erklärt leise, aber mit befehlender Stimme:{/n} "Die Plätze wurden eingenommen. Jetzt sprechen wir übers Geschäft." {n}Ihre Worte haben Gewicht, wie der Beginn einer rituellen Litanei.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Asil görünümlü yabancının yanında oturan Octaviana, hafif ancak buyurgan bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Herkes yerlerini aldı. Ticaret konuşmaya başlayabiliriz." {n}Sözleri, bir ayin duasının açılışına benzer bir ağırlığa sahip.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana, who is seated next to the regal-looking stranger, quietly but in a commanding voice, declares:{/n} "The seats have been claimed. Now we discuss the Trade." {n}Her words sound weight, the opening of a ritual litany.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Asil görünümlü yabancının yanında oturan Octaviana, hafif ancak buyurgan bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor:{/n} "Herkes yerlerini almış durumda. Ticaret'ten konuşmaya başlayabiliriz." {n}Sözleri, bir ayin duasının açılışı misali bir ağırlığa sahip.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
